A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Being a lifelong fan of previous Star Wars movies\, this one falls short for me.  Felt like the newbies tried to fix what was not broken\, and are trying to create  future marketing schemes\, instead of focusing on the fundamentals of what made Star Wars special to so many.  The real reasons for its success.  They wanted to kill the Jedi\, and I think they just did
